bb.png.description: A symmetrical box plot where the box quartiles span a wider range than the whisker quartiles
bb.png.source: Created by the Bootstrap Team based on contrived data

bh.png.description: a symmetrical histogram with tall bars on the left and right side, a gap in the middle, and shorter bars inside of the tall bars.
bh.png.source: Created by the Bootstrap Team based on contrived data

box-n-whisker-plot.png.description: A sample box-and-whisker plot based on contrived data

boxplot.png.description: box plot with a minimum around 6, maximum around 180, a box ranging from about 15 to 60 and a median around 40
boxplot.png.source: Created by the Bootstrap Team based on contrived data

box-plot-pounds.png.description: box plot of pounds with a 5-number summary of min: 0.1, Q1: 3.9, Q2: 11.3, Q3 60.4, Max: 172
box-plot-pounds.png.source: Created in pyret by the Bootstrap Team based on contrived data

box-plot-pounds-cropped.png.description: box plot of pounds. 5-number summary is not visible, but would be min: 0.1, Q1: 3.9, Q2: 11.3, Q3 60.4, Max: 172
box-plot-pounds-cropped.png.source: Created in pyret by the Bootstrap Team based on contrived data

boxplot-1.png.description: Box plot with a long left whisker, followed by 2 boxes and a right whisker that are all of equal size
boxplot-1.png.source: Created by the Bootstrap Team based on contrived data

boxplot-2.png.description: Box plot with 2 short whiskers of equal size and 2 wider boxes of equal size
boxplot-2.png.source: Created by the Bootstrap Team based on contrived data

boxplot-3.png.description: Box plot with a long right whisker. The left whisker and 2 boxes are all about equal in size.
boxplot-3.png.source: Created by the Bootstrap Team based on contrived data

boxplot-4.png.description: Box plot with 2 equal-size long whiskers and 2 equal-size smaller boxes
boxplot-4.png.source: Created by the Bootstrap Team based on contrived data

boxplot-6.png.description: Box plot whose whiskers and boxes all span equal distances
boxplot-6.png.source: Created by the Bootstrap Team based on contrived data

cb.png.description: a box plot where the left whisker falls directly along the left side of the box, the box representing the second quartile is twice as wide as the box representing the third quartile, and the whisker representing the fourth quartile spans about six times the range of the second quartile
cb.png.source: Created by the Bootstrap Team based on contrived data

ch.png.description: a histogram with 5 bins, which decrease in height from left to right
ch.png.source: Created by the Bootstrap Team based on contrived data

even.png.description: a box plot with four equal-size sections
even.png.source: Created by the Bootstrap Team in Pyret based on contrived data

fb.png.description: a symmetrical box plot whose whiskers span a range about double the size of either of the boxes in the middle
fb.png.source: Created by the Bootstrap Team based on contrived data

fh.png.description: a symmetrical histogram with bars of 3 different heights. The shortest bars are on the outside, the inner bars are about twice as tall and the bars in the center of the histogram are about 3 times as tall as the outer bars.
fh.png.source: Created by the Bootstrap Team based on contrived data

jb.png.description: a box plot with a long left whisker, 2 equal-size boxes that each span about 1/3 the distance of the left whisker, and a right whisker whose span is about 1/4 the size of either of the boxes.
jb.png.source: Created by the Bootstrap Team based on contrived data

jh.png.description: a histogram with 6 bins. The first 5 increase in height from left to right. The height of the last bin is in between the height of the fifth and sixth.
jh.png.source: Created by the Bootstrap Team based on contrived data

histogram-pounds.png.description: histogram of pounds, with a tall bar counting 17 animals weighing 0-20 pounds, and much shorter bars for the subsequent 20-pound intervals indicating counts of 3, 4, 2, 2, 1, 1, 0, and 2 animals respectively
histogram-pounds.png.source: Created in pyret by the Bootstrap Team based on contrived data

histogram-a.png.description: A histogram with 6 bins. The middle 2 bars are 3 times as tall as the rest.
histogram-a.png.source: Created by the Bootstrap Team based on contrived data

histogram-b.png.description: a histogram with 10 bins, equal in height
histogram-b.png.source: Created by the Bootstrap Team based on contrived data

histogram-c.png.description: a histogram with 9 bins. The first, sixth and seventh are empty. The second, fifth and eighth and ninth are 1 unit tall. The third and fourth are 3 times as tall as the others.
histogram-c.png.source: Created by the Bootstrap Team based on contrived data

histogram-d.png.description: a histogram with 9 bins. The first, fourth and fifth are empty. The second, third, sixth and ninth are 1 unit tall. The seventh and eighth are 3 times as tall as the others.
histogram-d.png.source: Created by the Bootstrap Team based on contrived data

histogram-e.png.description: a histogram with a big gap in the middle. The left-most two bins and right-most two bins are two units tall. Immediately toward the center from each of those pairs of bins is a bin that is one unit tall.
histogram-e.png.source: Created by the Bootstrap Team based on contrived data

InterpretData.png.source: Created by the Bootstrap Team based on work from @link{http://introdatascience.org/, Mobilizing IDS project} and @link{https://www.amstat.org/asa/files/pdfs/GAISE/GAISEPreK12_Intro.pdf, GAISE}

lb.png.description: a box plot with short whiskers. The box representing the second quartile is about 1/3 the size of the box representing the third quartile.
lb.png.source: Created by the Bootstrap Team based on contrived data

left.png.description: a box plot with a longer whisker on the left
left.png.source: Created by the Bootstrap Team in Pyret based on contrived data

lh.png.description: a histogram with 3 relatively tall bars on the left, a number of low bars in the middle, and a bar on the right that is slightly taller than any other bar

matchA.png.description: A box plot with a minimum of 3, a maximum of 8, a box spanning from 3.5 to 5 and a median of 4.5

matchB.png.description: A box plot spanning from 1 to 10, whose box spans from 3 to 8 and median falls in the middle of the box

matchC.png.description: A box plot spanning from 1 to 10, whose box spans from 5 to 6 and median falls in the middle of the box

matchD.png.description: A box plot spanning from 1 to 10, whose box spans from 7 to 9.5 and median falls around 8.5

matchE.png.description: A box plot spanning from 3 to 8, whose box spans from 3.5 to 7.5 and median falls in the middle of the box

codap-box-plot.png.description: A box plot spanning from 0 to 172, whose box spans from about 3 ot 65 with the median falling around 12

symmetricshort.png.description: a box plot with equally long whiskers, and boxes that are wider than the whiskers, but the same width as each other

watson.png.description: a box plot of the Smith family data clustered tightly at the right end of the number line
